content: You must nominate a chancelor. Your choices are p2, p3, p4, p5. Which player do you choose? Answer with their player number only.

You are President. You must privately discard one tile and pass the remaining two to your Chancellor, p2. The three Policy tiles you have to choose from are: 1)Fascist 2)Liberal 3)Fascist . Which Policy tile would you like to discard? Answer only with the number of the Policy tile that you want to discard.

You passed p2 the following Policy tiles: liberal, fascist and they played a 
p2 plays a Fascist Policy tile.
